title: User Login with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid credentials for each role (User, Admin, Super Admin).

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Input valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify login is successful and the correct dashboard is displayed based on user role.

title: User Signup and Role Assignment
description: Test the user signup process and verify that the default role is assigned correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page.
Input valid new user credentials and submit the signup form.
Verify signup is successful and the user receives a default role with appropriate access.

title: Password Recovery Flow
description: Verify that the password recovery process works correctly via email verification.

steps.description: Navigate to the password recovery page.
Enter registered email and request password recovery.
Complete password reset via received email link.
Verify user can set a new password and successfully log in using the new password.

title: Incorrect Login Credentials Handling
description: Verify that login fails gracefully when entering incorrect username or password.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click login.
Verify an appropriate error message is displayed and login is not successful.

title: Task Creation, Edit, and Deletion
description: Verify users can create, edit, and delete tasks with accurate status and deadline updates.

steps.description: Log in as a standard user.
Create a new task with title, description, category, and deadline.
Confirm task appears in task list with correct details and status set to 'In Progress'.
Edit the created task to change status to 'Completed' and update deadline.
Verify task reflects updated status and deadline correctly.
Delete the created task.
Confirm task is removed from the list.

title: Task Status Transitions and Deadline Visual Indicators
description: Verify tasks properly update statuses (In Progress, Completed, Overdue) and visually indicate deadlines.

steps.description: Create tasks with deadlines set to a future date, past date, and the current date.
Verify tasks with deadlines in the past show 'Overdue' status and visual indicators (e.g., red highlight).
Verify tasks with future deadlines show 'In Progress' status.
Mark an 'In Progress' task as 'Completed'.
Confirm the task status updates to 'Completed' and visual indicators correspond.

title: Task Drag-and-Drop Reordering Persistence
description: Verify that drag-and-drop reordering of tasks persists across page reloads in Kanban and table views.

steps.description: Navigate to the Kanban board or table view.
Drag and reorder tasks within a category or status column.
Confirm tasks reorder visually immediately.
Reload the page.
Verify tasks maintain the new order after reload.

title: Academic Course and Routine Management CRUD
description: Verify creating, reading, updating, and deleting courses and class routines including bulk imports.

steps.description: Log in as Admin.
Create a new course with associated details.
Confirm the course appears correctly in the course list.
Update the course details.
Verify updated details are reflected properly.
Bulk import multiple courses and routines using valid import files.
Confirm bulk data imported accurately with correct associations.
Delete a course and routine.
Confirm they are removed from the system.

title: Study Materials and Lecture Slides Upload and Preview
description: Verify upload, organization, and preview functionalities for study materials and lecture slides tied to courses and sections.

steps.description: Log in as Educator.
Upload study materials and lecture slides linked to specific courses and sections.
Verify uploaded files are visible in corresponding lists.
Preview lecture slides.
Confirm preview loads correctly without errors.
Delete uploaded materials and slides.
Confirm deletion is successful and files are removed from UI.

title: Announcement Creation and Section-based Filtering
description: Verify creating announcements and accurate filtering by user sections.

steps.description: Log in as Admin.
Create a new announcement specifying target sections.
Verify announcement appears in announcement list and is visible to users in target sections.
Filter announcements by section.
Confirm list updates correctly to show only announcements relevant to selected sections.

title: Admin Dashboard User Role Promotion and Demotion
description: Verify Admin can promote and demote users between roles and the system enforces appropriate permissions.

steps.description: Log in as Admin.
Select a user and promote their role from User to Admin.
Confirm updated role reflects immediately and user gains Admin privileges.
Demote the same user back to User role.
Verify the user loses admin privileges appropriately.

title: Super Admin Audit Logs and Admin Management
description: Verify Super Admin can view system audit logs and manage admin users including creation and role editing.

steps.description: Log in as Super Admin.
Access audit logs and verify recent system actions are correctly recorded.
Create a new Admin user.
Confirm new Admin can log in and has correct role permissions.
Edit existing Admin's role and permissions.
Verify changes are saved and enforced properly.

title: Push and In-App Notifications Delivery
description: Verify that push notifications via Capacitor and Firebase, and in-app alerts for deadlines and announcements are correctly triggered and received.

steps.description: Set a task deadline that triggers a notification.
Create an announcement targeted to the user.
Confirm user receives push notifications on supported devices for both task deadlines and announcements.
Verify in-app notifications appear correctly within the application.

title: Responsive Side Navigation Behavior
description: Verify that side navigation menus collapse and expand correctly and respond properly on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.

steps.description: Access the application on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes.
Toggle the side navigation menu open and closed.
Confirm the menu collapses and expands smoothly with appropriate animations.
Verify navigation functions correctly on all device types and sizes.

title: Search and Filtering Across Tasks, Courses, and Materials
description: Verify the accuracy and responsiveness of search and filtering functionalities across tasks, courses, and study materials.

steps.description: Input search terms in the search bar for tasks, courses, and study materials.
Confirm search results accurately reflect query with relevant data displayed.
Apply various filtering criteria such as categories, status, sections, and date ranges.
Verify filtered results match the specified filters with no unexpected data.

title: Performance Under Large Data Volumes
description: Verify that lazy loading, client-side caching, and virtualization mechanisms ensure smooth UI performance with large datasets.

steps.description: Populate the system with a large number of tasks, users, courses, and materials.
Navigate through lists, boards, and dashboards.
Verify UI freezes or delays are minimal and data loads progressively without blocking.
Ensure client-side caching reduces repeated loading time on revisits.

title: Offline Support and UI Animation Verification
description: Verify that the application supports offline use for allowed features and UI animations run smoothly across supported devices.

steps.description: Simulate offline mode on device.
Access cached data such as tasks and announcements.
Confirm that the user can view and interact with cached content appropriately.
Navigate through UI and trigger common animations.
Verify animations are smooth and without glitches on desktop and mobile.

title: Security: Data Privacy and Backend Access Controls
description: Verify secure data handling, environment variable protection, and backend access control using Supabase Row Level Security (RLS).

steps.description: Attempt to access data outside authenticated user scope.
Confirm access is denied according to RLS policies.
Test environment variables are not exposed in client bundles.
Validate sensitive configuration data is protected.
